metadata.name: Suspicious Process Patterns NTDS.DIT Exfil
metadata.comment: Detects suspicious process patterns used in NTDS.DIT exfiltration

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND ((endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\ntdsdump.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\ntdsdumpex.exe'))) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('ntds.dit')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('system.hiv')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('ntdsgrab.ps1')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('ac i ntds')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('create full')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/c copy ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\\\windows\\\\ntds\\\\ntds.dit')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('activate instance ntds')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('create full')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('powershell')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('ntds.dit')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('ntds.dit')) AND (contains(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\\\apache')) OR contains(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\\\tomcat')) OR contains(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\\\appdata\\\\')) OR contains(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\\\temp\\\\')) OR contains(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\\\public\\\\')) OR contains(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\\\perflogs\\\\'))) AND (contains(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\apache')) OR contains(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\tomcat')) OR contains(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\appdata\\\\')) OR contains(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\temp\\\\')) OR contains(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\public\\\\')) OR contains(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\perflogs\\\\')))))

output.summary: Detects suspicious process patterns used in NTDS.DIT exfiltration
